articles.title: Bird flu spreads across Canadian poultry farms - CTV News
articles.description: The avian influenza is spreading in poultry farms across North America, but experts say the risk of human transmission remains low.
articles.content:
TORONTO -- 
A highly contagious strain of bird flu is spreading in farms across North America and killing millions of poultry, but experts say the risk of human transmission remains low.

articles.title: Users of erectile dysfunction medications at higher risk of eye conditions, new study suggests - Toronto Star
articles.description: Conclusion follows an epidemiological study of health insurance claims of 213,000 American males who were regular users of common medications such as Viagra, Cialis, Levitra and Stendra.
articles.content: Regular users of common erectile dysfunction (ED) medications increase their risk of developing one of three serious eye conditions by as much as 85 per cent, according to a recent University of Brit… [+4201 chars]
